title: Intro to Blockchain
description: Undergraduate Introduction to Blockchain and cryptocurrencies, building on formal crypto and distributed systems.  Cover fundamental and practical aspects.  Includes programming projects and a report.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CS 3510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 3511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (CS 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 2261 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 2340 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
